mapper.select: SELECT W.f_agen_id_code as agenCode, B.f_bill_code as billCode, B.f_bill_name as billName, B.f_invnum as billNumber, W.f_author as signName, W.f_check_date as signTime, W.f_check_result as signStatus FROM fbe_writeoff W LEFT JOIN fbe_writeoff_billitem B ON W.f_apply_id = B.f_pid WHERE date_format(W.f_create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(date_sub(SYSDATE(), interval 1 day), '%Y-%m-%d')
